channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
Alright made a shop but get this error
[code=cpp]- Ploxagescape Online - Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "6 8 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:115) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:37) [/code]
while i have this error people can't join

item.description:
@Scarr wrote:

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Scarr Scarr
item.description:
@Scarr wrote:

check your shops.cfg, the last shop you added, make sure you have a tab in between them all, like

shop = 1	Varrock_General_Store				1	1	1931	5	1935	2	1735	2	1925	3	1923	2	1887	2	590	2	1755	2	2347	5	550	5

Like that, put a tab in between every single thing after shop = 1. if that didnt’ work put another tab after the 1.

Read full topic
